attributes.action: Introduce Container Deposit Legislation to clean up our streets and open spaces.
attributes.additional_details:
Container deposit legislation has proven itself to be very effective elsewhere in Europe (Germany, Denmark, etc) and North America.

A 10p deposit on each item, eg: 15 items would be worth £1.50, is not a huge amount - but enough to make people think twice before littering and/or a sufficient incentive for someone to pick up such items.

Prices would not increase - as any deposit paid is refundable upon return.

This petition requests that the Government put a Bottle Bill before Parliament.
attributes.background:
Tons of litter consisting largely of plastic bottles and aluminium cans is dumped on our streets, roads and parks each year. It remains littering our streets - or costs councils millions of pounds to pick up.

The UK has one of the worst litter problems in Europe - Let's clean up our country.
